description:
Learn how to create a digital book with free and free with the help of a specialist eBooks software.

The Booknando Courses promotes this mini course with the goal of teaching to produce a simple digital book using free and open software. The course is open to all who love reading and want to know the fascinating world of digital books.

In the course we will learn how to pass a PDF file format to ePub format, formatting it in Sigil and preparing software for free distribution of the eBook. Teach the basic elements of the production of digital books in a simple and easy way to show a direct and practical language the basis of production and realization of an eBook.

The course material is available on the Booknando page.
title: Aprenda como criar um eBook
